department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Box, wood, ivory inlay, Arabic slip inside box reads 'X10' Box, small, wooden inlaid with bone; octagon shape, the top panel divided into four sections by striped bands, each panel inlaid with a design of uneven triangles, the whole bordered with a band of squares and checker shapes. This border repeated on the sides of the box between two bands formed of narrow oblongs of bone. The box sits on four small bracket feet
title: Box
